ygData.subject: Re: MORE Guild info
ygData.msgSnippet: Sandy, Whoever you spoke to at Verant cannot possibly know what they are talking about. When we got guild approval, after I wrote and then revised a charter,
ygData.messageBody:
Sandy,
Whoever you spoke to at Verant cannot possibly know what they are talking
about. When we got guild approval, after I wrote and then revised a charter, it
was not based on any specific server. I know that the names of the guilds are
universal, because otherwise, we could have used the "Unity" name that someone
else had, unless we were on the same server.

I have emailed verant last night and not received a reply yet. I will let
everyone know when I do.

If this matter is not resolved the way I think it should be, that will be the
last straw for me and EQ will be uninstalled and I'll save $10 per month.
